articles.author: Emily Stewart
articles.title: America's economy is getting swallowed up by middlemen — and it's driving people crazy - Business Insider
articles.description: The real winners in today's economy are the middlemen — rich intermediary companies like Walmart, Airbnb, and Lyft that connect buyers and sellers.
articles.content: Bill Gates has been right about a lot of things over the years Microsoft, mosquito nets, the risk of pandemics. One thing he was not so right about: the idea that the internet would cut out the econo… [+10180 chars]

articles.title: ‘Remarkable’ drug results against an aggressive leukemia - statnews.com
articles.description: At the end of a tense year for science, the American Society of Hematology heard promising data on acute myeloid leukemia, Von Willebrand disease and more.
articles.content:
